thread.title: Yoo Ah In’s Hairstyle Draws Attention In New “Chicago Typewriter” Stills
thread.title_full: Yoo Ah In’s Hairstyle Draws Attention In New “Chicago Typewriter” Stills

author: notclaira
title: Yoo Ah In’s Hairstyle Draws Attention In New “Chicago Typewriter” Stills
text:
Shares 577 Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
On March 23, the upcoming tvN drama “Chicago Typewriter” (directed by Kim Cheol Kyu and written by Jin Soo Wan) revealed some stills of Yoo Ah In and Im Soo Jung ’s characters’ first meeting at an airport. 
In the stills, Yoo Ah In, who plays a celebrity writer, can be seen easily navigating a crowd of fans. Im Soo Jung, who plays a fan, can be seen reacting to his presence. Soompi.Display.News.English.300x250.BTF Soompi.Mobile.English.300x250.ATF 
Meanwhile, Yoo Ah In’s new buzzcut for his role has been garnering attention online, with fans and netizens comparing the hairstyle to military enlistment haircuts and rapper BewhY. 
“Chicago Typewriter” begins airing on April 7 at 8 p.m. KST. You can watch the teaser here !
